OK.moreinfo: The request was successful and the response body contains the representation requested.

SUCCESS.moreinfo: The request was successful, we updated the resource and the response body contains the representation.

ACCEPTED.message: The request has been accepted for further processing, which will be completed sometime later.
ACCEPTED.moreinfo: The request has been accepted for further processing, which will be completed sometime later.

noContent.message: The request was successful; the resource was deleted.
noContent.moreinfo: The server has fulfilled the request but does not need to return an entity-body, and might want to return updated metainformation. The response MAY include new or updated metainformation in the form of entity-headers, which if present SHOULD be associated with the requested variant.

FOUND.message: A common redirect response; you can GET the representation at the URI in the Location response header
FOUND.moreinfo: A common redirect response; you can GET the representation at the URI in the Location response header

notModified.message: There is no new data to return.
notModified.moreinfo: Performed a conditional GET request and access is allowed, but the document has not been modified.

badRequest.message: The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served
badRequest.moreinfo: An accompanying error message will explain further. For security reasons, requests without authentication are considered invalid and will yield this response.

UNAUTHORIZED.moreinfo: Change set validate/deploy fails with error invalid parameter value if it contains a profile with View All Data permission

FORBIDDEN.moreinfo: See the accompanying message for the specific reason (most likely for exceeding rate limit)

notFound.moreinfo: The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested does not exists.

invalidRequest.message: The request specified an invalid format
invalidRequest.moreinfo: The request specified an invalid format

resourceGone.moreinfo: Used to indicate that an API endpoint has been turned off

manyRequests.message: request cannot be served due to exceeding the limit
manyRequests.moreinfo: request cannot be served due to the application’s rate limit having been exhausted for the resource.

serverError.moreinfo: Something went wrong. Please try after some time

badGateway.message: The service is down or being upgraded. Try again later
badGateway.moreinfo: The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

serviceUnavailable.message: The service is up, but overloaded with requests. Try again later.
serviceUnavailable.moreinfo: The servers are up, but overloaded with requests. Try again later.

gatewayTimeout.message: Servers are up, but the request couldn’t be serviced due to some failure within our stack. Try again later.
gatewayTimeout.moreinfo: Servers are up, but the request couldn’t be serviced due to some failure within our stack. Try again later.
